#### Tender Description

The Fisheries and Oceans Canada is soliciting proposals for laundry and dry cleaning services to support the Canadian Coast Guard College located at 1190 Westmount Rd, Sydney, Nova Scotia. The scope of work includes furnishing all labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision to provide laundry and dry-cleaning services in accordance with the current industrial standards for dry cleaning and laundry work.

#### Requirements

* Services shall be delivered and rendered within two working days upon receipt of a request for delivery made by telephone, email, or facsimile.
* Delivery and pick-up of items by the contractor shall be made prior to 15:00 hours on weekdays, excluding holidays and days of rest.
